body_text: I pulled out the data that was being stored in the prototype into its own separate object - turns out we dont need those attributes on the class itself, just need them while registering the protocol handler.
body: I pulled out the data that was being stored in the prototype into its own separate object - turns out we _dont_ need those attributes on the class itself, just need them while registering the protocol handler.
body_html: I pulled out the data that was being stored in the prototype into its own separate object - turns out we dont need those attributes on the class itself, just need them while registering the protocol handler.
